summary: Completed comprehensive testing of crypto gadget e-commerce site. Backend APIs are fully functional (22/22 tests passed). Frontend core functionality works including authentication, cart, checkout, orders, and AI recommendations. Minor UI interaction issues identified with dropdown selectors and product detail navigation.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selector not clickable due to element interception
Clicking product cards doesn't always navigate to product detail page

design_issues.issue: Some Unsplash images failing to load with ERR_BLOCKED_BY_ORB

passed_tests: Product listing page with all products (40 products displayed)
Cart page showing items with quantity and total
Checkout page with shipping address form
Order placement with both payment methods
Orders page showing user's order history
All backend API endpoints (22/22 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix UI interaction issues: 1) Category dropdown selector element interception preventing clicks, 2) Product card click navigation to detail page not working consistently. These are minor UI issues that don't affect core functionality.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core functionality works, minor UI interaction issues)
